first_come2.en_us: Click the 'mine' button to get you first ore!
first_come2.zh_cn: 点击'挖矿'按钮以获取你的第一块矿石

first_ore.en_us: Amazing!You have got your first ore!Try to get more!
first_ore.zh_cn: 太棒了!你已经获得了你的第一块矿石!试着获取更多!

first_ten_ore.en_us: Great!You have collected 10 ores!Now you can update your mine machine!
first_ten_ore.zh_cn: 真好!你已经收集了10块矿石!现在你可以升级你的挖掘机了!
